books.title: The Stand
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: A pandemic has devastated the world, leaving only a few thousand people alive. The survivors are now divided into two groups: those who have been affected by the pandemic and have developed supernatural powers, and those who have not.

books.title: The Deep
books.author: Nick Cutter
books.description: A team of scientists journey to the bottom of the ocean to explore a mysterious and deadly virus that has wiped out an entire research station. But as they descend deeper and deeper into the abyss, they begin to lose their grip on reality.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: In a dystopian future, the government has total control over every aspect of citizens' lives. Winston Smith, a member of the ruling Party, begins to rebel against the oppressive regime and falls in love with a fellow rebel.

books.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
books.author: Douglas Adams
books.description: Arthur Dent is whisked away from Earth moments before it is destroyed to make way for a hyperspace bypass. He sets off on a series of adventures across the galaxy with his alien friend Ford Prefect and the two-headed, three-armed ex-president of the galaxy, Zaphod Beeblebrox.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: Holden Caulfield, a teenage boy from New York, is expelled from his school and sets out on a journey of self-discovery. Along the way, he meets a cast of characters that force him to confront the complexities of adulthood.
